original_text: Now the name of Hebron formerly was Kiriath-arba. (Arba was the greatest man among the Anakim.) And the land had rest from war.
korean_text: 헤브론의 옛 이름은 기럇 아르바라 아르바는 아낙 사람 가운데에서 가장 큰 사람이었더라 그리고 그 땅에 전쟁이 그쳤더라

sentences.original_text: Now the name of Hebron formerly was Kiriath-arba.
Arba was the greatest man among the Anakim.
sentences.korean_translation: (아르바는 아낙 자손 중 가장 위대한 사람이었더라.)

sentences.original_text: And the land had rest from war.
